episode: I stopped watching a streamer I've been watching for months

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I quit watching one of my old favorite streamers

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What made you stop watching them?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It just felt boring to watch them

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: People can get stale after a while.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I feel bad about it though

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Loyalty is hard to shake off.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It feels like I've abandoned them

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Guilt's a natural part of moving on.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It feels like I've lost a friend

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a deep connection to have.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It feels like I'm just projecting my own issues

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe, but feelings are still valid.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Everyone says that

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: ClichÃ©s often hold truth though.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wish I didn't get bored so easily

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's tough to stay engaged sometimes.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It feels mean to call other people boring

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Harsh on them, and on yourself too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I miss how it used to be

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nostalgia can be bittersweet.
